thread.title: Diljit Dosanjh Pens Heartfelt Letter Thanking Fans And Apologises For His Mistakes Too
thread.title_full: Diljit Dosanjh Pens Heartfelt Letter Thanking Fans And Apologises For His Mistakes Too

title: Diljit Dosanjh Pens Heartfelt Letter Thanking Fans And Apologises For His Mistakes Too
text:
facebook 625 SHARES 
The ever charming Diljith Dosanjh was already an established star in the Punjabi film industry before making his Bollywood debut with Udta Punjab . He has been winning hearts ever since. His latest outing Phillauri has been a hit with his fans as well. 
Recently, Diljit took to Facebook to thank his fans for the kind of love and appreciation he has been receiving from them. But, surprisingly enough he also apologised to his fans, in case he has made any mistakes in his journey so far. Read his post here. 
Let us assure you Diljit, you have only been winning hearts so far! Facebook
